Statement: Aww who am I kidding, this place isn't exactly heaven on earth. Let's go shall we.
*Sigh* You know what, Terry once told me that home is where you belong and I just can't see myself abandoning it.
H-hey, who goes there? Oh it's just you, it's nice to meet you.
Option 1: Sorry to scare you sir. I'm new around here and was just wandering around.

Statement: Oh... well what are you doing around these parts and what do you want from me?
Option 1: Can you tell me about the lab lands?
Option 2: I'm searching for the Arc of Life, do you know anything about it?
Option 3: What are you doing here all alone?

Statement: The lab lands? I guess I could tell you.
Option 1: Are there any people living there?
Option 2: What do you know about the lab lands?

Statement: There are plenty of wackos there... probably. Not like I've ever been there but you can assume a lot about a world as messed up as this one.
Option 1: What do you know about the lab lands?
Option 2: Thank you, let me ask you something else.

Statement: Well from what I know, a large jungle sprung in that area a long time ago but I've never heard from anyone who's ever gone there before.
Option 2: Thank you, let me ask you something else.

Statement: Uhhh... pretty sure that's because of the labs that they built over there. Oh, I'm sorry you must not have known that already.
Option 1: Thanks for your time, anything else you can tell me?
Option 2: Thank you, let me ask you something else.

Statement: The Arc of Life? I personally don't know anything but I might know someone who does.
Option 1: You don't know anything at all? What about this person you speak of?
Option 2: Do you? That's great, what's this person's name?
Option 3: I'm not entirely surprised to be honest.

Statement: He's a friend of mine named Terry Wrist. He's a huge nerd and could probably help you more than me. Don't tell him I said that by the way.
Option 1: I understand, if you can't help than I'd best be going.
Option 2: Kinda disappointing that you can't help me.

Statement: HoLd on now feel like I might miss something interesting if I simply let you go now. Besides I never liked losing to that guy.
Option 1: If you don't want me to count you out just yet then say so.
Option 2: Well you're right about the "interesting" part.
Option 3: Hey now don't get ahead of yourself.

Statement: Say... How about I help you out by joining you, then at least Terry won't be able to badmouth me later.
Option 1: If you're sure you wanna accompany me you might wanna think about it a little more.
Option 2: You don't exactly seem like the kinda guy who can handle an adventure.
Option 3: I think I'd like to see the two of you fight actually.

Statement: This is my shack, where I live by my lonesome. You're the first visitor I've had in quite a while, to be honest. You weren't being followed or anything right?
Option 1: What have you been doing here all this time?
Option 2: Well it sure seems cozy I guess.

Statement: I like to sing and dance, but I can't really do it in front of strangers on account of the fact that I get too nervous.
Option 1: Thanks for your time, anything else you can tell me?
Option 2: Alright then, let me ask you something else.

Statement:
Where the lush rivers stand
And the blue rising water surrounds...
Option 1: Thanks for your time, anything else you can tell me?
Option 2: Thank you, let me ask you something else.

Statement: It sure is. In this city you gotta get what you can and I think I'm doing alright for myself.
Option 1: Good for you, anything else you can tell me?
Option 2: Thank you, let me ask you something else.

Statement: Hold on, hold on... I just realized that joining you would mean me leaving my home.
